After dinner Alicia helped you shave your legs. You marvel at how smooth they are.

Alicia gives you a nightie, but gives in and says you don't have to wear it if you don't want to. but she does tell you to continue wearing the bra to get used to it.

You go to sleep.

the next morning Alicia get you up really early, saying that you still need practice being a girl since you both have school in 2 hours.

over the 2 hours She taught you to walk in heels and how to sit like a girl, making sure to smooth your skirt and keep your legs together.

finally its time for school, Alicia helps you with your makeup again saying that you'll have to learn to do it yourself but not now. she hands you an outfit and you get dressed.

you're standing at the bus stop with your sister shes wearing capris and a tight T-shirt. You're wearing a white knee length skirt and a tight blue blouse, both of your bras are stuffed to fill the D-cup bras your wearing.

your first day of school as a girl.

1411211.content: It turns out that they programmed you for a boys gym class. They assign you a girl's locker but you cant start until they give you a girl's class. "Thank god!" you think. You sit in the gym watching the players when a girl about you're age comes up to you. "Hey, I'm Rebecca" she says. "I'm Cady" you say. It turned out that you had alot in common, except that you were a girl, not a boy so you couldn't ask her out. The period ends and you go to your next class.

14112112.content: It turned out that you, Alicia and Rebbecca had the same last period. After you introduce her to Alicia she invites you and Alicia to her house. "Sure! Right Cady?" Alicia says. "Sure..." you say unsteadily. You start walking, luckily she only lived a few blocks away from the school. Alicia uses her cell phone to tell your parents that you're going to a friend's house. They say ok and you arrive at her house. It is a regular size house. You walk in and meet her family. She has a 9 year old sister and lives with her mom. You go up to her room and start talking. She tells you that her family belongs to a country club and that she can invite two friends to a dance that the club is holding this weekend. "So Cady and Alicia, do you want to go? It's formal dress by the way" she says. Alicia looks at you and you shake your head "why not". "Yay!" Rebecca says. "Lets exchange phone numbers" Alicia says. You have fun until you and Alicia have to go home for dinner. You go home, do homework and get ready for tomorrow. Alicia says "Well, tonight we can work on nail polish!" She takes out her make up bag and takes out red, blue and pink nail polish. She also takes out stick on french nails. "Ok which do you want?" she asks. "I dont know you pick" She picks pink. She shows you how to properly put nail polish on. Then after it's dried you go to sleep.
14112112.title: Rebecca invites you and Alicia to her house

141121122.content:
The rest of the week goes by more or less the same, equally embarrassing, but you're getting a little more used to being a girl,

Tuesday you have different classes since you have Block schedule, you introduce yourself as Cady again as usual, the boy that sits next to you clearly has a crush on you and isn't good at hiding it, he's always looking at your legs and your pseudo cleavage. You do your best to ignore him. That night you get more practice walking in high heels

Wednesday you have gym again, but this time aren't lucky enough to get out of it, you're given a gym uniform and locker, you change, making sure to wear the sports bra Alicia gave you, and stuffed it full as usual, Other than that, gym wasn't too different from when you did it as a guy. That night Alicia has you practice doing your own makeup

Thursday it is a sweltering hot day and Alicia convinces you to wear a mini skirt today, when you go outside you realize as much as you hated to admit it, she was right, in the skirts you'd been wearing all week it's be like an oven between your legs, the short skirt lets a nice breeze go past your legs, but its still you, a boy, in a mini skirt. and that guy in your science class definitely noticed. That night Alicia has you practice painting hers and your own nails, and she shows you how to dance as a girl, its not really hard, you just had to follow what Alicia did. Lastly before heading to bed, you and Alicia sort through some of the last remaining unpacked boxes, among them, one is full of fancy dresses, Alicia sorts them out and chooses a few that would work for the Dance, and lets you choose the one you'd wear.

Finally Friday, the Dance is this evening, The usual classes, Gym class feels so sexist, you hadn't noticed back when you were a guy, but now it seems totally unfair, on Wednesday the boys used the weight room, today they played soccer, The girls class... *Your* class Wednesday did stretches then, light jogging and finished with Yoga and today Aerobics then Tennis. After school, you take the bus with Alicia and Rebecca to your house.

Rebecca's Mom dropped off her dress at your house earlier so you can all get changed there.

Your mom pulls you aside and gives you a small box, in it are some high quality breast forms, they glue to your chest and will stay there solidly for up to a month, she got them because the dress you chose was a halter and it wasn't worn with a bra.

you accept them and go to the bathroom with your mom to have her help put them on, she brushes the special glue on your chest and on the form, them presses it firmly to your chest for about 30 seconds, then does the same with the other one. They're much heavier on your chest than you expected, and your not sure if you should be glad to have them or not, for one, they'll make it less likely that you'll be discovered, on the other hand, you now have realistic breasts on your chest for about a month, not to mention they're bigger than your sisters real ones.

You leave the bathroom, in only your bra, and skirt and panties.

Alicia is nearly finished changing into her spaghetti strap pink dress, she sees the breasts you have and winks, the helps you into your blue and white halter top dress after removing your bra. You finish getting dressed, Rebecca has finished dressing earlier and is finishing up doing her hair, so she does yours while Alicia does her own.

Rebecca wonders why being the more feminine of the two 'sisters' why you can't do hair, you make up an excuse about how your sisters always been better so you've always just let her do your hair.

After Rebecca has finished your hair She and Alicia discuss what kind of makeup is appropriate for the dance and they get together and get all three of you done, the final result leaves you looking quite feminine, along with your sister and new friend, you look like three cute girls ready for a dance. You've been ok with all this feminizing, but you're silently dreading going to this dance

You arrive and get out and walk to the building where the dance is. You the three of you sit down and place your purses on the table. Then the cute boy from science walks up to you. Wait did you just call him cute? Nevermind hes walking over. "Hey, aren't you Cady? From science?" he asks. "Yeah" you say. "Would you like to dance?" What do you say? You've never been asked that as a girl before.

A slow dance starts and he pulls you in closer. You can sense that he really likes you. He puts his head closer and starts to kiss you. It's a long kiss before he pulls away. How do you react?

"I..." you start.

"I'm sorry, I thought..." he said.

"No, it's... I have to go." you run back to the table and pick up your purse. "Alicia, bathroom, now."

You enter the bathroom and Alicia follows.

141121122112.title: You are  confused

1411211221121.content:
knowing that if you kissed a girl and she suddenly had to leave you would be broken hearted you decide to stay, for now in the bathroom. You turn the events over in your head, of course you don't blame him or anything. it was a very sweet kiss
"It was my first kiss too." you say under your breath and more to yourself than anyone else but being the only people in the bathroom your sister hears of course and jumps for joy. "Cady that's awesome!" part of you agreed that it was awesome, the rest of you was confused and more than a little frightened. Alicia is pretty good at reading your face. After all it's her face too.
She hugs you "Just forget about all of that tonight okay? Just have fun being cady. Worry about cody later yeah?" You nod hugging your sis back.

After a few minutes of touching up your make up you're back in the ballroom where you find your cute science boy chatting with rebbeca. You shake off the strange feeling of jealousy as he looks up at you and smiles. "We were worried you might have gotten lost." he laughs pulling your chair out for you. You giggle "Well maybe you can show me around some time jimmy." You smile and then blush at the possible implications.

The four of you sit quietly while everyone else dances on the floor. "Say how bout a dance." rebbeca says grabbing alicia's hand. "Sure." she smiles leaving you two at the table. After some awkward chit chat about school you loosen up finally.
You watch you sister dancing with rebbeca to some pop song "You're a really good dancer." you say turning back to jimmy. "Thank you, my mom and dad run a dance studio together. You're really good too." you blush. "Nah, my sister taught me only a few days ago." "Well if you ever want to learn more maybe I can teach you."
He says taking your hand in his. "I'm sorry I ran out like that." you finally say. "It's no trouble. I thought I might have been a bad kisser or something." you chuckle at him "definitely not." You blush again as he smiles his cute smile at you once again.

Jimmy stands up as another slow song begins. "Care to dance?" you take his offered hand and say "I would love too." You glide onto the dance floor, he pulls your body closely to his, you instinctively rest your head on his shoulder. [he smells so good] you think. Opening your eyes you see your sister doing the same with rebbeca.

You spend the next two hours dancing on and off with jimmy, rebbeca and your sister. Laughing and having a grand time with all of them.
"Alright ladies and gentlemen this will be our last song of the evening. We really enjoyed your company and we hope you've enjoyed ours." The leader of the band announces to the now sparsely filled ballroom. Jimmy takes your hand one more time as the band begins to play a slow smooth song that sounds like it could come straight out of cinderella. You know it's the last dance of the evening, you know you'll have to leave soon, you know you'll have to leave him soon. He spins you around into his arms and dipping you. You feel your heart pounding in your chest as you look up into his blue eyes. He smells so good. He looks so good. He dances so good. You pull yourself into him and kiss him.
You realize the song has ended as he stands you back up leading you off the dance floor.

The entire car ride home you don't know what the other girls were talking about as you stared out the window at the star filled sky from the back seat.
On autopilot you walk into your house, not realizing that your sister was in the car still for more than fifteen minutes after you left. Once in your room you smile at the girl in your mirror before humming the final song to yourself and re-enacting the last dance with jimmy once more when you're broken out of it by a knock on your door.
"Uh, Who is it?" you ask
1411211221121.title: You'll stay for now.

14112112211212.content:
"It's me can I come in?" You recognize your sis's voice and let her in. "What are you smiling about?" you realize for the first time you haven't stopped smiling and try to hide it but can't no matter how hard you try and you both end up giggling.
"No reason. Are you just getting in? What took you so long?" She smiles at you and motions for you to turn around so she can help you out of your dress. "I was just outside with becca talking. We have a lot in common." The cold air hits your back as if it were reality itself. "We thought we might go do something tomorrow." She continues as you replay the events of tonight in your head. You kissed jimmy. You kissed a boy, twice! You couldn't even say he kissed you and that was all because you had definitely kissed him the last time. "He was such a good kisser though." "What?" you realize you said it out loud. "I-i well" you never were good in a crisis.

You feel yourself being spun around face to face with your sister. "What's wrong?" they say twins can read each other's minds and you wish that were really true because you don't want to say it out loud all the things you were feeling. "Don't tell mom or dad about jimmy?" You don't think she would run tell them to hurt you but more likely she would tell them out of excitement that you had your first dance and your first kiss all in one night. She's never been as exceptionally cruel as that.
Sanna can tell there's more to it than that but understands you're not ready to talk about it. "Mum's the word." she says embracing you.

Later that night you actually listened to what she was talking about this time. Her and rebecca had decided to go to the movies tomorrow and while she said you were welcome to come you felt like she wanted it to be just the two of them.
Your mom and dad asked how the dance was and you said you had fun dancing with rebbeca and sanna, which was true enough, leaving out jimmy. You manage to get away with as little discussion about the events as possible claiming to be so very tired which you realized suddenly was actually true. "Dancing takes a lot out of you." You say with a more than passing smile.
14112112211212.title: Sister

141121122112122.content:
The rest of the weekend passes very quickly but it is by no means uneventful. On Saturday, while your parents go to the mall, you and Alicia stay home and rummage through some of the unopened boxes of girl's clothes, with you trying them on for Alicia and adding any things you like to your wardrobe. When choosing clothes you find yourself leaning towards the more feminine and girly clothes like mini skirts and dresses so by the time that your parents arrive home, your closet is almost full to bursting with new clothes.

As your parents arrive, you are informed by your mom that your dad slipped away from her in the mall and used the last of his savings to buy a whole set of male outfits. He carries these in the house with a look of satisfaction on his face, even as you glower at him. The result of this is that you will not have a set of male clothes for the foreseeable future as there is no more money to buy some for a while and the phone call your mom made with the moving company revealed that the chances of finding your lost clothes are slim to non.

While you had been hoping to make Cady disappear without people noticing so you could go back to living as a boy, this was now no longer possible as changing without arousing suspicion after so long would be impossible. He would be found out. Your mom realising this, yelled at your father for a good half hour and also tried to make things up to you by signing you up to dance and ballet class since you said you enjoyed dancing a the country club so much. While this was well intentioned, it only served to complicate your situation more, nevertheless, you thanked your mom for the gesture not wanting to make her feel worse than she already did.

The rest of the afternoon you spent sat in your room, contemplating the future. In the early evening, Alicia gets ready to go to the movies with Rebecca. When finished you notice that she is wearing her favourite dress and heels and her hair and makeup is done to perfection. You also notice that she is extremely excited, talking a mile a minute. When Rebecca comes to pick Alicia up, you see them both off. Rebecca wears a pair of skinny jeans and a nice jacket and she compliments your sister on her dress as she comes to the door. You watch them leave and when they are a fair way down the round you see them look all around before holding hands.

The rest of the evening you look some more through the clothes box and try on some new clothes again. What surprises you about the clothes is that most if not all seem unworn, they're creased of course but some even still have price tags. Why wouldn't someone miss all these clothes?

Later in the night, Alicia returns having been walked home by Rebecca. She heads to her room and when you go in to ask her how it was, you find her with the similar dreamy smile that you had, after the dance. Apparently she enjoyed herself greatly and she doesn't stop telling you how much in common her and Rebecca have and what such a great person Rebecca is. It's at that point you put two and two together.

"You have a crush on Rebecca don't you?" You asked after Alicia had just finished telling you how caring a person Rebecca was. She immediately turns bright red at this and a smile crosses her face.

"No that's silly" she says trying to sound serious but she then proceeds to giggle.

"Aha" you say. "You do have a crush of Rebecca. So does that uh..." You pause to think how ask your next question. "Does that mean your, you know a lesbian."

"I suppose so" Alicia said regaining composure, "I've never been into boys and couldn't picture myself going out with one and Rebecca is so pretty and treats me well...' She drifts off again smiling but snaps herself out of it. "Yeah I think I am a lesbian but how about you? You kissed Jimmy and you've never had a girlfriend are you gay?"

This causes you to think. While you really did enjoy dancing with and kissing Jimmy and worryingly, you could also picture yourself being in a relationship with him as Cady, you also can picture yourself in a relationship with a girl and still find them attractive. "I don't think so, I still like girls." You say sheepishly.

"Maybe your bisexual" Alicia chips in.

"Yeah maybe" you say thoughtfully.

You two both talked through the night, bonding as siblings. Alicia makes you promise not to tell your parents about Rebecca and then you both turn in for the night. After the talk you feel that you and Alicia have grown closer as twins and truly do have each other's back.

Sunday goes by in a flash, with homework being the only highlight.

As Monday morning comes, you shower and get ready for school. You decide on wearing a red floral summer dress, a matching bra and panty set with a pair of nude pantyhose and black ballet flats. After breakfast, you walk to school with Alicia and Rebecca and immediately notice the change in the way that act around each other. Where possible they hold hands, Rebecca sometimes moves a stray strand of hair from Alicia's face caressing her as she does it and most blatantly they gave each other a light kiss on the lips before entering the school gates when sure no one but you is around.

Now it is the end of English class and you are about to head to your last lesson.
141121122112122.title: monday bloody monday

1411211221121221.content: Is it a good meeting or a bad one?
1411211221121221.title: Bump into Jimmy

14112112211212212.content:
On the way to your last lesson, you meet Alicia in the crowd.

"Hey sis" she says happily and then moves next to you.

"Hey, how was your day?" You reply.

"Boring as usual but it's nearly over so that's a plus."

You both chatter mindlessly as you walk until you both take a short cut through the gymnasium to get to the other side of the building. The gym is empty and both of your footsteps echo slightly. When you reach the centre, the doors on the other side of the room fly open and two people burst through, both entwined, making out. This is a normal occurrence as many students hide in the stands of the gym to skip class and make out so you and Alicia keep walking. As you get closer, the identities of the couple becomes clear. There he is, Jimmy from the country club, the same Jimmy you danced with and kissed now with his arms around another girl called Claire swapping saliva. You stop dead still and feel like you have just been hit in the stomach and in your shocked state you drop your bag. The noise of your bag dropping causes the couple to stop kissing and whirl round. Claire notices you and Alicia first but then looks away, not thinking you as threat but when Jimmy turns to see you, his face visibly drops and he tries to disentangle himself from Claire.

"Hey." She says as he tries to get away from her. "We're supposed to be skipping class for a date, what gives?"

It's at this that you start to cry. Overwhelmed by the betrayal you feel, tears start rolling down your cheeks and you audibably sob. You know that you and Jimmy only danced and kissed and hadn't officially got together but he was your first kiss and that had only been two days ago and now he had found someone new. It appears you cared about Jimmy more than you thought which only succeeds in confusing you more, adding to your already distraught state.

As this was going on, Alicia watched in disbelief the scene unfolding around her. Her face went from to confusion to anger and she strides forward to meet Jimmy before her reaches you.

"You little worm, how could you do that to my sister?" She yells at the top of your voice. "You're disgusting." She then turns to Claire. "You want to leave soon before he hurts you too." Working out what is going on, Claire gives Jimmy the death stare and then leaves the room before uttering the word "pig" as the door closes.

Jimmy just gapes at the situation, not knowing what to say. "You're never going to get a girlfriend in this school again, I'll make sure of it." Your sister says before picking up your bag and grabbing you by the hand and leading you to the exit to the girls bathroom with you still sobbing on the way.

After ten minutes of comforting, your sister has calmed you down and you're no longer crying, but you still feel terrible though.

"There you go sis." She says giving you about the fifteenth hug. "It's okay now, it's good to let it out."

You blow your nose and wipe your eyes. "Thanks" you manage. "I don't know what came over me."

"You must have really liked Jimmy." She says "I can't imagine how terrible you must feel but I'll make sure he doesn't get a chance to do this to anyone else again"

"Thank you" You say gratefully.

"No problem, that's what sisters do" she says with a giggle "Now let's help you fix your makeup."

1451111111.content:
You're actually glad of the opportunity to get out of the house and stretch your legs, and have a look around your new neighbourhood. The flip flops at least let you walk normally - you had seen some shoes amongst the clothes with frighteningly high heels, and you couldn't image trying to walk in those, and a twisted ankle is pretty much the last thing you want now. You're quite self conscious, particularly the feel of the bra and panties and the shortness of the dress, but more than anything else you're worried that you might just look like a cross-dressing boy rather than actually looking like a girl.

There's a small group of boys in the park, and you know that this will be the test. If anyone, you reckon they'd be able to tell the difference. You start getting a bit anxious. What will they do if they realise you're a boy? What would you do? You decide to steer yourself away from them, and perhaps keep a bit of distance. You realise you're actually shaking a bit. Grief, this isn't good. You see a bench - fortunately empty - and decide it may be for the best to sit down, at least until you stop shaking. You hadn't anticipated how nerve racking this trip out would be.

As you sit down, the dress rides up your legs a bit, so you hitch it down again, and decide to keep your legs close together. Hmm, you hadn't given any thought previously why girls sit the way they do. Now you're starting to appreciate the benefits of pants.

You sit for a few minutes, trying to calm yourself down, whilst watching the boys, who are sat on the grass 50 feet or so in front of you. A horrible thought then occurs to you. You start at the local school after the weekend, and these boys could well be your new classmates. Whilst you decided to try dressing as a girl to get out a bit over the weekend, that was a stopgap only. You intend having some other clothes sorted out for school (although at this point you're not entirely sure how). You certainly don't want these boys seeing you as a girl now, and possibly recognising you as a boy next week at school. That could be mightily embarrassing.

Whilst mulling over the situation you're in, and working through various worst case scenario of what might happen, you fail to notice what's going on around you.

You are suddenly aware of a presence nearly, and someone sits down on a bench beside you.

Who is it?

145111111131.content:
"Well this is me, thanks walking back with me but I need to really need to start getting everything unpacked and put away" when you finally get a word in and walk towards the door to unlock it.

"Oh no problem, sorry if I talked your ear off I got kinda carried away with all the gossip" smiling to herself. "I don't have to be home for a few hours so I can help you if you like?"

Not wanting to really have to pretend to be a teenage girl longer really appeals to you but with so much work left to do it would be beneficial to have somebody else to help out. "Actually that would be great, there is so much to do on my own" you say against your better judgement.

"Great I'll help" she says as she rushes past you into the house. "I really want to check out your wardrobe and what a great way to do it than help you unpack" giggling as she rushes upstairs as you follow.

Over the next couple of hours Chelsea helps you start to unpack all the boxes in your room. Every now and then she would stop to shriek over such cute or awesome clothes you had received and begged you to let her borrow it at some time, of course you said yes as you didn't know what else to say. With all the work being down you started to get to know more about the ups and downs of her love life and about her family from her annoying older brother to her overbearing mother and workaholic father, no wonder she didn't want to head home right away and would rather spend time with a stranger helping them move in.

"Okay so you now know everything about me you need to spill about you" she said as she grabbed another box from the hallway. "Tell me about you, what made you come to live with your aunt? Also where is she? Shouldn't she be helping you unpack?"

After all she told you about herself its only fair to share with her, "My parents died a few months ago when we were in a car accident, I was the only one to survive" your voice slightly trembling as you start to tear up. "After their funeral I was to go into foster care but my aunt has taken custody of me until I'm 18" tears start to roll down your cheeks. "I've had to move away from all my friends and come here with her. She saved me from going into care but her job takes her away a lot" you choke back as Chelsea drops the box and rushes over to give you a hug. "I've lost everything!" you scream into her chest as she holds you tight as you burst into tears.

"Oh I'm so sorry babe" holding you tight to her chest. "If I knew it would of upset you I wouldn't have asked" she comforts you by stroking your head as you cry. Calming down she pulls you away from her chest and looks at your face with your mascara ruined from your tears. She wipes away the last of your tears and smiles warmly at you "Feeling better?"

"Yeah... I'm sorry... I don't know what came over me" you start to blush embarrassingly. "Think this has been the first time I've actually spoken to somebody about it and a complete stranger as well"

"Who you calling a stranger missy!" Chelsea playfully acts hurt and insulted bringing a bit of a smile to your face.

"Okay not that strange" you add playfully causing you to giggle yourself. She must be rubbing off on you as you would never of done that before.

"Thats what I thought" she grins triumphantly. "Now just need to get you cleaned up" reaching over to your wig pushing your hair back under it and straightening it.

Frozen in shock that she just pushed your hair under the wig you start to stutter "You... You knew... Knew I was wearing a wig?"

"Not until I was stroking your head and it moved" she giggled to herself and your shocked face "Why don't you take it off, its not like I don't know now and you are most likely going to be more comfortable without it."

Begrudgingly you take it off and let your real hear fall from your head, not as long as the wig but still short not to be considered a girls cut. "There now you know" you say sheepishly expecting to be laughed at or worse called a pervert.

"Oh babe its not that bad, it just needs to grow out some more and a new layered cut" she beams at you trying to make you feel better. Noticing she isn't convincing you she reaches behind her head and pulls off a large strand of hair. "See even my hairs not all real" giggling and she hands it to you. "We just need to get you some extensions" as she takes it back from you and puts it back in her hair effortlessly like she has been doing it for years. With her head down she notices your cried mascara marks on her top and proceeds to take it off.

Shocked at what just happened and what you are seeing as an attractive teen girl stands in front of you in just her bra. "What are you doing?" you finally question.

"Oh you got mascara all over my top so just borrowing one of yours" she says as she goes over to your wardrobe and picks out a white shirt with lace bodice and squeezes herself into it. Checking herself out in the mirror she turns to you "How do I look?" as she poses for your approval.

"Cute" is all you can say which is at least true.

"Good you might not get this back for a while as I think I'm in love with it" she laughs at her own joke. Hearing a beep of a phone she turns towards her purse on the bed and rummages through to find hers. Taking it out she sighs "Looks like I've got to get home now but I'll see you later" picking up her bag and comes over and kisses you on the lips. "Its been fun and we should totes do something before starting school next week."

Surprised by the kiss you just nod and smile at her "...Sure."

"Great I'll take you around town and show you all the cool spots to hang out and have a big girls day" walking out of your room she bends down to pick something up out of your vision. "Oh and now I know you would have not problem if you got with Marcus" giggling as she turns around with one of the largest vibrators you have ever seen in your life in her hands.

Blushing bright red as she hands it over to you can only splutter as you take hold of it, not sure what else to say "Er... Thanks... Sounds good."

"Our secret babe" she giggles as she makes her way down the stairs and out the door.

Stunned at what has happened today you can't believe that even after the wig was removed she still thought of you as a girl. Was it the clothes? The make up? Or are you that good at presenting as a girl? All these questions hammer through your mind as you make your way back up to your room. Looking around you can't believe that this is your room, it looked nothing like the one you had with your parents. This one is definitely more of a teenage girl with the desk doubling as a vanity table full of make up, the feminine clothes bulging out of the wardrobe and the bed sheets being ultra soft and feminine.

Anyway it was getting late and after today's roller coaster ride of emotions you are not hungry and just want to crawl into bed and sleep. All in all, what you were each wearing was definitely ruined at this point.

Not in the best of moods, you all arive at your new home. At least all of the boxes had arrived. Wanting to change, you all open the clothing boxes. Unfortunately, you and your family was shocked by what they found in the boxes. It was definitely not your clothes. Instead, it looked like the clothes of a family like yours, but the sizes were completely off.

There were clothes that looked to be made for a man, but they were way too small, and looked to be Kelly's size. There were clothes meant for a woman, but they wouldn't fit your mother, and instead looked your size. There was clothes for a teenage boy, but they wouldn't fit you, but did look like your mother's size. And the strangest of them all was the oversized little girl's clothes, that looked to be your father's size.

"What the hell is going on here!?" your father demanded


"I know no one is going to like this, but maybe we should put on something of these..." your mother suggested.

"What? No way!" You and your father protest.

"But the clothese we're wearing are ruined, so we need to change."

"I'm not wearing any of this! I'd rather go na-"

"Not in front of Kelly, you won't!" your mother said sternly.

There is a bit more of arguing, but eventually, your mother convinces you and your dad to go along with this, but just until you get more appropriate clothes.

-----

Not long after, you are now dressed in your new clothes. You hate that you are now wearing a dress. You hate that there wasn't a single pair of pants in the clothes your size. You even had a pair of panties on underneath. You look over to Kelly, who is looking at herself in the mirror. She was wearing a white polo shirt and a pair of kahki pants.

"I look like I'm the daddy now!" Kelly said with a giggle. "And you're the mommy!"

"At least someone is enjoying this..." you grumble.

You and Kelly then walk into the living room, where yor dad is sulking. Judging by his attire, there weren't any pants in his clothing options either. He is wearing a blue dress. As for your mom, she wore a red t-shirt and jeans.

Kelly can't help but giggle. "Me and Alex are the parents now! I'm the daddy, Alex is the mommy, mommy is the big brother, and daddy is the lttle sister."

Her comments do not help your dad's mood, but he refrains from doing anything because he knows Kelly is just playing. She was acting like this was all a game of house to her. But you weren't happy. But for a moment, you had a brief thought about what it would be like to be the mother in this family, but it quickly passed so fast you didn't even realize you had thought it.
15513.title: Something else

155131.content:
The next morning, you wake up and look around, and find yourself in a large bed. You then realize that in your tired daze last night, you had wandered into and slept in the master bedroom. As you get up out of bed, you notice that you are not alone in the bed and see your sister sleeping in it next to you. You chuckle aquietly at this and get out of bed. You then look down at yourself and recall the events of yesterday. You are wearing a white silk nightie, though you don't recall putting it on last night.

You then notice that the boxes with the clothes that fit you and Kelly are i your room and empty. You now vaguely recall unpacking last night while you were tired, though you don't know why you bothered since this is only temporary. Opening the closet, you see that everything for the two of you is inside. You were actualy surprised by how much clothes their were. You then walk over to the drawers and open it up, and find that your new underwear is inside. Grabbing the first one you can without looking, you walk over to the closet and look for something simple to wear. As you look through, you absentmindedly start to put on your underwear without paying much attention. You eventually settle on a simple white dress. You then start to put it on, when you finally take notice of your underwear. It was a pair of lcey white silk panties, but what suprises you more is you see that you had grabbed a bra with it and had actually put it on! You fumble with it a bit but can't seem to unhook it. "How did I even get this thing on in the first place?" you wonder aloud to yourself. After having no luck, you eventually give up. You then notice that the bra fits you perfectly, as if it was made for your flat, male chest. "Must have been an extremely flat woman." you comment to yourself as you finally put on the dress. After that, you look at the extensive collection of footwear, and take out a pair of simple flats. Dressed, you leave the closet and take a look at yourself in the mirror. You dislike the sight of yourself in women's clothing. But unfortunately, there was nothing you could do.

After leaving the room, you see that you are apparently the only one awake right now. But then you notice how early it is, which suprised you as you weren't usually an early riser. You decide to make yourself some breakfast, and head into the kitchen. As you take things out you decide that not only will you make breakfast for youself, but you'll also just prepare for the whole family. Taking out a a couple frying pans and supplies, you notice an apron hanging on a rack, and put it on as you begin to make breakfast. You then began to prepare a large breakfast, making homemade pancakes, an omlette, bacon, and some toast.

Eventually, your family starts to wake up, just as you finish cooking. Your parents came in half asleep, and were evidently still dressed on the clothes they had went to bed in. Your dad was wearing a pink nightie with a picture of a princess on it, and mom was wearing a wife beater and some sweatpants. Kelly was the only one dressed, wearing a polo shirt and some khakis.

"Morning everyone." you greet them.

"Wow, I'm surprised you made breakfast." your mom says as she took a seat.

"You look cute, daddy." Kelly says.

He looked down, and apparently just now realized what he was wearng. He was clearly annoyed. "I have no idea what I'm doing in this." he grumbles. "I was planning to sleep in my birthday suit last night. I don't remember even putting this on."

"Actually, I don't remember putting this on either." your mom comments. This briefly reminds you of how you woke up this morning but quickly forget it as you serve breakfast. Everyone begins to eat, and it becomes clear you did a good job, as everyone is definitely enjoying the meal.

"This all pretty good, son." your dad compliments.

"I agree." your mom says. "But when did you learn to cook like this?"

It was then that you realize that this was the first time you had ever cooked anything. "Uh, I don't know. This was my first time."

"Really? Well, you did a wonderful job! Maybe you should cook more often."

"I guess I could." you say. "Why don't I make dinner tonight to see what else I can do?"

"Sound good. If you need any help, just let me know."
155131.title: The next day

1551311.content:
An hour after dinner you finished doing the dishes still wearing your apron, your mother and father come downstairs, your mother is wearing denim shorts sneakers and a t-shirt with a picture of some sports team on it, you recognize it and you know you should at least remember their name but for the life of you you can't pace it, so you let it go, for now. Your father is wearing a sundress with a daisy's all over it and a pair of yellow maryjane shoes with white frilly ankle socks.. You also notice your fathers arms and legs are shaved, his normally shaved face is still shaved but there's something else there too, you could swear his skin seemed smoother and his cheeks seemed ...shinier maybe? Was it blush or just embarrassment you couldn't put your finger on it.

"Well don't you look nice." You say to your mom like you've heard your mom say to you so many times when you went out to hang at the mall with your buds. She sticks her tongue out at you "thanks mom, you look pretty too." She teases back at you when she slaps your fathers butt. "We found this bottle of pink stuff-" "nair" your mother interrupts. "-nair, your mother wanted me to use it so I wouldn't look so ridiculous. I don't think it works." Your father looks at his feet while digging one into the carpet, twisting it left and right. "We'll I think it works, you look...like a princess." Your father blushes and glares at you, you',ve always had a weird kind of relationship with your parents, they did the normal stuff, made sure you went to school stayed away from drugs and bad influences, but it was more like you they were friends who watched your back. Your father loved pulling pranks on you and didn't get mad if you returned the favor so long as you didn't injure anyone in the process or screwed up his sleep. Your mothers greatest joy in life was laughter, she erupts into laughter and kisses your fathers curly auburn hair. "Yes she's a pretty princess." Your father glares at both of you, knowing from the look he's planning his revenge already. "Anyway were going shopping, maybe we'll find some clothes before school starts in a few months. We couldn't reach the moving company this morning. Will you be a dear and watch Kelly?" "Sure." "Come and princess." Your mother says as she pulls your father to the front door and outside.

After taking time to laugh, you look around for Kelly, finally finding her in the basement where she's still going through the boxes. "Kelly? What are you doing?" She turns around and holds out two small jewelry boxes. "What are these?"
1551311.title: During the day

15513111.content:
You look at the two boxes she held and saw that inside was a pair of wedding rings. "We should wear these. If we're the mommy and daddy, we should wear them!" she says with a giggle.

"You still going on about that?" you ask her.

"Its fun to pretend. Its like we're playing house." She says as she takes out the gold band from her jewlery box and put it on. You are a bit surprised that it actually fit her finger perfectly, but figure that it makes sense considering the size of the clothing she wore. The man who had owned them would obviously be a small person with small hands. She then looks at you pleadingly.

"Ok, fine." you say as you take out your ring, a cold one with a small gemstone in it, and put it on. "There." You were a bit surprised that it fit your hand perfectly.

"Now we're husband and wife." she said with a giggle. You look down at the wedding ring on your finger. You had to admit, you were starting to like it.

The two of you the head back upstairs. Kelly sits on the couch, and you start to wonder what to do. It was then that you start to think to yourself that the place looked filthy. It was to be expected though, as no one had lived here for a long time, so dust was natural. Still though, you decided to do something about it. Heading back to the basement, you find a box full of cleaning supplies, and gather everything you need.

You are surprised by your actions over the next two hours. You had never really been a neat freak, and often let your room get messy. But for some reason, you are very meticulous while cleaning the house. You scrub the kitchen floors and counter, clean the bathroom, everything you can think of. As you head into the living room to vacum, you see Kelly still sitting on the couch watching tv. On the screen is a sports game, and you wonder when she started liking sports. You glance at the tv as you clean the room, but find yourself growing bored with it. You figure that it must just be an uneventful game, and get back to focusing on cleaning.
15513111.title: Wedding rings

choices: She tells Alex about her and his fathers adventure
Finished, Alex looks just like his mom
155131111.content:
Alex had been busy cleaning the house the best he could. With the circumstances the way they were and his parents out trying to find proper clothing for the family. He thought it was the lest that he could do. Before he started thou, he went back to the master bedroom to find something to wear. The white dress and flats that he had on was not appropriate for cleaning. Standing in his bra and panties we went through the closet. "Now that all the boxes have been unpacked, I should be able to find a pair of slacks or shorts to wear." He said to himself. While he was standing by the closet he looked at himself in the mirror, noticing his flat chest and the bra that held up, nothing! Walking over to a dresser he found some nylons that he rolled up and stuffed into his bra. "Better" he said with a smile. "If I'm going to dress like a woman, I should at least try to have a figure like a woman". He said as he walked back to the closet. Spotting a pair of shorts on one of the shelves. Lifting the shorts up to his waist he discovered how well they fit, along with how short, these shorts were. Finding a plain baby blue t-shirt . He went back to his cleaning.

Meanwhile Kelly was busy playing with the remote and the TV. Sitting in what was considered her Dad's favorite chair. She had her legs tucked under her short body and was flipping between a ball game and what was her favorite children's shoe. She was having a hard time concentrating on either. When she was watching the ball game, she kept thinking that she hatted baseball and when she was watching the show "Bratz" she felt that she was to mature to watch something so childish.

A few hours later....

The kitchen and both bathrooms had been cleaned. Not as clean as Alex's mother would have cleaned them, but Alex felt pretty proud, given that he was a 16 year old boy and took the initiative without being told to do so. He was thinking this while sitting down at the kitchen table, legs crossed at the knee and wearing nothing but female clothing. Deciding that he should go and wash up and change before his parents got back home, he went back to "his" room to shower. Tossing the shorts and shirt in the corner of the room (something he would have done before the move) he went and turned on the shower. Noticing the lady razor he thought that he should save his legs and armpits. "If my dad can shave his legs and then so can I." He said upon entering the shower.

Back in front of "his" closet. He stood there butt naked looking over the hundreds of dresses and clothing options that now presented themselves to Alex. One by one he would take a dress out of the closet and place it in front of his body. Still naked, he wanted to choose a dress so that he could match his lingerie to the dress. A perfectly normal process he thought to himself. He eventually settled on a navy blue wrap dress that had capped sleeves. Setting in on the bed went over to his dresser and found a set of navy blue lace panties and bra. Putting on the bra this time was no trouble and he had it stuffed with nylons giving himself a nice C cup. Finishing with the dress he went back to the closet to survey the endless shoes that this women owned. There was everything, from flat and wedges, to stilletoes and knee high boots. Alex could feel his enxiety level rise. He was after all just a 16 year old boy, what did he know about womens clothing and shoes. He thought that he should look for a pair of flats, because they would be the easiest to walk in". He thought. But when he was looking he found a pair of 4" navy blue heels that he couldn't take his eyes off. "Obviously they go with the dress" he said as he went over to the edge of the bed to put them on. One by one he slipped them on. He carefully got up and took a couple of wobbly steps, stopping to straighten out his dress. He took another deep breath and walked back and fourth, until he felt comfortable in his heels.

Alex was in front of the full length mirror admiring his reflection and the dress that he had on. Turning from side to side and doing a full spin in front of the mirror. In the mirror he saw someone looking at him. Stopping in his tracks, he turned to see that his mom was at the door way. Still wearing the clothes that she left it. She had a huge smile on her face and entered the room. "You're so beautiful." she said to Alex, causing him to blush. "We need to do your hair and put on some makeup." She said as she grabbed his hand and pulled him over to the makeup table.
155131111.title: Your parents return empty handed

155131112.content:
A short time later Kelly passes by you as you are cleaning and straightening up the bedroom your mother had slept in last night.

“Where are you going?” you ask Kelly.

“I’m going to go to the bathroom...Dear,” Kelly responds with a giggle.

“Oh how cute, you referring to me as dear,” you quip, not noticing her laugh sounded a little less childlike.

“Well, we are married, Hon,” she says holding up her left hand to display her wedding ring.

“If you say so,” you reply, feeling a strange sensation of pleasure at the notion.

Finished with that bedroom you head over to the master bedroom. You swear it sounded like someone standing up to pee coming from the bathroom, but dismiss it as imagination and go about fixing the bed.

A moment later Kelly comes out of the bathroom. “Oh thats better,” she says absently scratching at her chest.

You glance over at her but fail to notice a subtle change about her. Her cheeks, chin and upper lip seem to be a little darker shaded than the rest of her face. “Say if you don’t mind, would you be so kind as to take those empty boxes out to the garage,” you inquire.

“Sure, Alex, are they completely empty?” she asks, chuckling a little deeper sounding this time.

“I think so, but you can check them just to make sure,” you say smiling.

Kelly goes to the basement and grabs the boxes and after stacking several inside each other, starts dragging them to the garage, while you go back to straightening up.

Kelly gets to the garage and starts breaking down the boxes, as it seems the thing to do. All of the boxes were empty, until she comes to one of the smaller boxes, labeled as ‘head of the house’. Inside she finds a very adult related item, a partial carton of cigarettes, some lighters and a few assorted ashtrays. She puts them on the work bench and finishes breaking down the boxes for the trash. Having finished she grabs the carton and pulls out a fresh pack. Without even thinking about it, she tamps it a couple of times on the palm of her hand then opens it up, throwing the cellophane in the trash can. She puts the pack in her shirt pocket. Grabbing a lighter, she puts it in her shirt pocket also before grabbing the carton and the remaining items and heads back in the house.

While you were down the hall finishing up in the last bedroom that your father had spent the night in, Kelly heads to the master bedroom and puts the carton and extra lighters in the nightstand next to the bed and puts an ashtray on top, then puts one in the bathroom and heads to the living room with the other ashtrays. After dropping one in the kitchen she goes back to the living room and sets down in a recliner and starts scanning channels.



Kelly had another sports show on, but she wasn’t really watching it. Instead she was studying the pack in her hand, a short red and white box with gold lettering. She had a vague recollection of grabbing them and even opening them. She knew they were bad for one’s health, it even said so on the side. No one in her family had ever smoked, but she was curious now that she had them in her hand. Flipping the top up she grabbed one, pulling it out, putting the pack back in her pocket. It was several inches long, white with a brown end. She sniffed at it cautiously, noticing a strong dried weedy smell, tobacco, she realized suddenly. It didn’t seem to smell to bad, she thought, as she put the brown tip in between her lips and took a pretend drag. It had a very bland taste she noticed. She pretended to smoke it for a while longer, going through the motions of inhaling and flicking ashes off into the ashtray. As the minutes passed she became rather comfortable with holding it. Curiosity peaked she grabbed the lighter from her pocket. She hesitated a moment as a sudden urge to light it crossed her mind.

You come back to the kitchen and notice the ashtray on the table, puzzled as when it was put there. You didn’t remember seeing it earlier. Hearing the T.V. you head to the living room. Just as you are entering, you see Kelly flicking a lighter in her small hand and putting the flame to the tip of a cigarette hanging between her lips. You watch in amazement as she inhales a deep drag, causing the tip to glow brightly, then Kelly takes the cigarette between her index and middle finger and holds it out in front of her turning it slightly back and forth for a moment, studying it, before exhaling a stream of smoke to the side.

“Kelly! What are you doing?” you ask, distraught and curious at the same time. A feeling of this being normal flashing through your mind.

“Oh, hey Alex, I found some cigarettes in a carton in one of the boxes I was throwing out. Good thing I checked to see if they were empty,” she replied nonchalantly, casually taking another deep drag, before exhaling through nose.

“You don’t smoke, none of do, what do you think you’re doing?” you question, waving your hand trying and dissipate the smoke, put off by the sudden smell.

“Well, they were in a box that was marked ‘head of the house’. All the boxes were marked like that; woman of the house, son of the house, daughter of the house. Since I’m playing the daddy I figured that meant they were mine,” she replied, the logic of it making sense to her.

You blinked in astonishment at the situation. Your little sister was smoking a cigarette and looking like she had done it for years. “Well, I’m just surprised to see you smoking in our new house,” you heard yourself reply.

“Oh, I didn’t even think about it,” Kelly says getting up and heading toward the front door. “I can go out front and finish it, if you would prefer.”

You shake your head, “No, your fine. You just caught me off guard, thats all.”

Kelly comes over and gives you a hug. You feel a strange comfort as she holds you. After a moment she steps back. “That’s why you make a good mommy. You are so understanding,” Kelly says as she brushes a strand of longer hair away from your face.
She surprises you even more when she leans up and pulls your face to hers and quickly kisses you on the lips. “I like being the daddy, this is fun,” she says taking another drag and setting back down in the recliner.

You’re feeling confused. The smell of her cigarette was no longer seeming like an issue, it was normal. You found yourself enjoying the kiss your little sister had just given you. You had even felt...stubble from her face against yours, the taste of cigarettes on her lips didn’t even bother you, it was part of what you were finding enjoyable. You were attracted to your ‘husband’. You tucked your hair behind your ears and went to the kitchen suddenly feeling the need to start fixing something for lunch.
155131112.title: Something else

choices: More with some of the family interactions
1551311121.content:
An hour later, you were about finished preparing lunch, when your parents returned home. “Hi guys, how did shopping go?” you asked without turning around.

“Crappy, no one would accept our credit cards and we didn’t have any cash,” your mom replied.

“Wouldn’t accept them, why not?” you asked turning around. You looked at your mom and dad, something seemed off about them but you couldn’t put your finger on it.

Both of them had changed slightly while they had been gone. Your mom now had a peach fuzz mustache on her upper lip and her hair was shorter and she looked younger, while your dad had less hair on his body than this morning and longer hair on his head, not to mention his face seemed softer in features and even a little younger appearing too.

Neither of them noticed your own changes. Your hair had grown longer and your face was older appearing, slight wrinkles around the corners of your eyes and mouth.

“When they looked at the names on the cards they wouldn’t believe they were ours. They kept trying to tell us that we couldn’t use our parents cards without them present. Can you believe that?” your mom said with frustration.

“They kept calling us kids and no one seemed to care that I was wearing a dress,” your dad said sounding embarrassed as stared at the floor.

“I’m sure it just because of the way you were dressed. You do kinda look like kids, so. Something does seem different about you both as well, you look, I don’t know, younger. Maybe if we go back later tonight or tomorrow and try again we’ll have better luck,” you offered.

“Ya, maybe,” your mom muttered in frustration. She changed the subject, “Did you have any company while we were gone?” as she noticed a smoky smell in the house.

You shook your head, “No, just the two of us,” you answer not paying any attention to the cigarette smell anymore.

“So, what have you and Kelly been doing since we were gone?” she inquired, curious for an answer to explain the smell.

You smiled with pride, “Well, I spent the morning cleaning the house, straightening up our rooms while Kelly took all the boxes to the garage.”

Your mom looked around and realized everything was cleaner. “Wow, it is cleaner, now that you mention it. How did you know what to do, you never helped before?” she said amazed, forgetting about the smell.

“Oh it wasn’t that hard. I just did what needed to be done,” you answered brushing your hair out of your face again for what seemed to be the umpteenth time.

“Well, you seem to be just the little housewife,” you dad said jokingly.

You felt a bit of joy from his statement, which you found odd. “I’m dressed for the part, might as well play it up, right, Princess?” you countered back. “Lunch is almost ready, so why don’t you ‘kids’ clean up and we’ll eat,” you jokingly add.
1551311121.title: Your parents return

15513111211.content:
Your parents headed to clean up and you decided to do something about your hair being in your face and went to the master bedroom. You dug around in one of the dresser drawers till you found what you were looking for; a hair scrunchee. With a practiced ease you pulled your hair back into a high ponytail and pulled it through to hold it into place. You paid no attention to your altered reflection as you watched yourself in the mirror, not noticing your more feminine appearance; longer hair, smoother, softer skin, shaped eyebrows.

You took a quick moment to go to the restroom. Without thinking you lifted your dress and sat on the toilet. After a few moments, you finished, grabbed some tissue and wiped your groin, again paying no attention to your smaller anatomy or changed behavior.

After washing up, you started to head back, but thought you could use a little color on your lips. You grabbed a tube of lipstick from one of the drawers that was full of makeup and quickly ran it around your lips, then dropped it back in the drawer and headed to the kitchen.

You started putting everyone’s meals on a plate when your mom returned. Walking over she watched you as you worked. “Wow, you seem to have found yourself a career,” she chuckled.

“It’s not that hard, besides I want to do it, oddly enough. It feels....right,” you comment.

She then noticed the ring on your left hand. “Where did you get that? It looks like a wedding ring, a big one no less.”

You smiled holding out your hand so you could both look at it. It was a delicate beautiful ring, with a large, at least 1 maybe 2, carat diamond set in it, with several smaller ones around the edges. “Kelly found it this morning. She insisted I wear it. You know, since she feels like we are playing house and she says I am the mom and all. She says we’re married, she has on a ring too,” you said with a smirk.

“It’s definitely bigger than the one I had. I wonder who this stuff belonged too anyway,” she answered.

“I don’t know, dear, but they were definitely different from who we are,” you replied not realizing the term of endearment you had added. Your mom just looked at you puzzled for a moment, before going over and setting down.

“Lunch is ready,” you called out as you finished setting the plates. A moment later your dad came in and sat at the table across from your mom. Right after that, Kelly came in and sat at the head of the table. Kelly had changed more since last you had seen her and especially since your parents left this morning. Her face was older looking, with a few wrinkles here and there, her eyebrows were thick and dark, and her hair was considerably shorter. She now had a noticeable five o’clock shadow along with some longer darker hair peaking out of the top of her open shirt neck and on her exposed arms and legs.

You all keep staring at each other during the meal, all knowing something was different about each other, but no one was saying anything.
15513111211.title: Lunch

155131112112.content:
After finishing, Kelly looked over at you, “That was delicious, Hon,” she commented, her voice sounding slightly deeper and gruff. Your mom and dad snickered at her comment, both sounding childish.

Kelly glanced at both of them. “Well, it was. Alex is good at being the mommy,” she commented.

“I suppose he is,” your mother replied, her own voice sounding slightly different.

Kelly looked around for a moment and not seeing what she was looking for, got up and went to the living room, grabbed the ashtray, her cigarettes and lighter. Kelly returned and sat down, putting the ashtray on the table in front of her. She then pulled out a cigarette from the pack in her hand and lit up, inhaling quickly, leaving it hanging from her mouth as she put them back in her shirt pocket.

Your parents’ mouths both fell open as the watched their young daughter casually took a deep drag, obvious by the glow from the tip, before grasping it firmly in the space deep between her fingers. “KELLY, what is the meaning of this?” you mom exclaimed, her voice cracking, confused at the sight of her young daughter smoking.

“What, it’s a cigarette. I found a partial carton of them in one of MY boxes this morning. They must be my brand and besides, I find it relaxing,” Kelly calmly answered, taking another drag then flicking ashes into the ashtray.

“What do you mean your box and since when has it been okay for you to smoke?” your dad demanded, his own voice sounding a little higher. He watched Kelly rested her elbow on the table, her hand in front of her face and in a very masculine way hold the cigarette in her hand. After a moment she took another drag, exhaling through her nose.

“As I said, they were in my stuff. We all had our own boxes and you have your girly things, Alex has his mommy things and Andy has her boy things,” she answered, referring to your mom by her given name. Kelly put the cigarette in her mouth and got up to refill her glass of tea.

“But, who said it would be okay for you to smoke cigarettes. You are only 8 years old and 8 year olds do not smoke,” your mom exclaimed. “Alex what have you allowed her to do?”

“I admit, I was a little surprised myself this morning. We talked about it, but she insisted she is the head of the house, so....what was I supposed to do,” you added, looking down at the wedding ring on your finger, as Kelly came back to the table and sat down. You unconsciously placed your hand on her’s in support.

Kelly took another drag, the cigarette hanging from the corner of her mouth, exhaling as she answered, “They were in one of the box that had ‘man of the house’ on it. All of THOSE things fit me and me only, so then that makes me the daddy and I can smoke if I want.” They were both surprised as how calmly and casually, yet forcefully, almost adult-like, she behaved. She showed no signs of being bothered from inhaling or by the smoke drifting across her face. Kelly looked at both of them expecting more questions, but neither asked anymore questions about i, feeling as if they had just been scolded, just as you had done earlier.

Kelly looked to you as she took her cigarette in her free hand. “Thank you for your support, Alex, you are a wonderful wife,” she said leaning over and kissing you on the lips with a quick peck. Your mom and dad didn’t know what to say.
155131112112.title: No one says anything

1552.content:
You refuse, theres no way you're gonna wear her clothes.

your sister Kristy just jokes about it, "oh c'mon you'll look so cute in a skirt and heels."

You continue refusing and start to say stupid things

"I'm no fag I'm not wearing anything that sissy stuff."

Kristy brings the car to a stop.

"I was kidding about the skirts you know I have plenty of regular T-shirts and baggy jeans that will be fine."

"no way, if they're yours they're girls clothes and I'm not wearing them."

Now visibly angry she replies.

"Fine then find another place to stay if you're gonna act like that.

You're not sure if she's serious or not and you drive the rest of the way in Silence

When you arrive at her house, she grabs her purse and stomps into the house, you start to follow, when she slams the door and locks in behind her. and wouldn't you know it it starts to rain soon afterwords.

You yell for her to let you in, apologizing for acting that way, you'll wear whatever she has, she stays silent.

After nearly an hour of being left out there, you here the door click open.

You rush in "thank you thank you, I'm so sorry for acting like that."

"you're forgiven" she says, but you're not so sure, "here, I brought you some dry clothes."

she hands you a pile of clothing, what looks like a dress, on top of the pile is a lacy bit of string, a thong you realize.

"wh-what about the boyish clothing you talked about"

"that ship has sailed brother, I think you need an attitude adjustment, and some time as my sister is just the thing
1552.title: You downright refuse

choices: You're not going out like this, You'll make something
You're way to exhausted to make dinner, plus you'll have to get used to this....
15522.content:
You hesitate, but your sister just stands there with her arms folded. She's not backing down.

You start to unbutton your jeans, you ask "Do I seriously need to wear this thong? aren't my boxers fine."

"You will wear everything I handed you."

"ughh, fine." you finish taking off your jeans and then your shirt. before you put the dress over your head you realize she's handed you a bra in the pile, you glare at her, but quickly look away, you struggle to get the clips to latch, your sister just watches you struggle with it.

Finally after a few minutes working with it, you get it to clip, then the dress goes over your head.

Your sister starts explaining her rules.

"while You live with me, You'll wear whatever I give you to wear, no arguing, if you do I'll give you something worse, second you'll do any chores I ask you to do. You'll always be wearing makeup, and high heels. You'll keep doing this until I think you've learned your lesson. If for any reason you disobey or I think you're not learning anything I'll kick you out right there and then, if your lucky I'll let you keep wearing whatever it is your wearing, if not, You'll be out, naked.

As she's been explaining the rules you've gotten the dress on, and even switched your boxers for the thong, you slip your feet into her high heels.

"Now that You're all ready, you have a choice, we can go out to get dinner or you can make something for us."
15522.title: Go along with it

info.brief_description: A guy moves, and due to a mistake, he gets the wrong boxes, all he has is women's stuff
info.description:
Our Hero Sam, is moving across the country, he doesn't know anybody but has an awesome new Job, he packs up his stuff, and then flys to his new Home, when he gets there, he finds that the boxes delivered by the U-haul company are not his, and that not only does is he not able to get his stuff, he has no way to contact the U-haul company, hey, they were cheap, and not a very large company, he's stuck with this for the time being,

I added choices for other families or people feel free to create a different story on the same idea, there are lots of open choices still
